title: Taint a node with key `tier` and value `frontend` with the effect `NoSchedule`. Then, create a pod that tolerates this taint.
description: Taint a node with key `tier` and value `frontend` with the effect `NoSchedule`. Then, create a pod that tolerates this taint.

steps: 1. kubectl taint node node1 tier=frontend:NoSchedule # key=value:Effect
2. kubectl describe node node1 # view the taints on a node
